name: mindelay
description: Sets a minimum delay before a callback can be called, no matter how long it takes for the caller to call it.

scripts.test: node node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test && echo All tests pass. && npm run lint
scripts.lint: node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint.js mindelay.js test && echo Linting passes.

author: Clive Chan (cc@clive.io)
